name: Avoid having handleHardIOErrors property enabled (EGL)
description:
This rule checks the combination of 1 property and 1 variable :  handleHardIOErrors (NO | YES) and VGVar.handleHardIOErrors ( =1 | absent | ...).
1. If EGL: handleHardiOErrors property is set to NO, than no problem.
2. If EGL: handleHardiOErrors property is set to YES and VGVar.handleHardIOErrors = 1 , than also no problem.
Other cases than these two must be a violation of this metric.
output: This report lists the following information: Program full name
rationale:
handleHardIOErrors property  must be set to NO
"VGVar.handleHardIOErrors = 1" used instead. Usage is default of VAGEN migration also it's required for VAGEN Compatibility
remediation: Try to always have the handleHardIOErrors property disabled.
